title: Sound On: RNC Chair McDaniel, Donald Trump Jr.
itunes:title: Sound On: RNC Chair McDaniel, Donald Trump Jr.
description:
Guests: Andy Puzder, Senior Fellow at the Pepperdine University School of Public Policy, Former CEO of CKE Restaurants and Author of “Getting America Back to Work,” RNC Chairwoman Ronna McDaniel, AB Stoddard, Associate Editor at Real Clear Politics, Lester Munson, Principal at government relations firm, BGR Group, and Donald Trump Jr., Executive VP at the Trump Organization.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
itunes:author: Bloomberg
